channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Control Desk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Control Desk

item.title: CVE-2021-20559|2024-09-17T01:21:57.029Z -- ibm -- control%20desk
item.description: IBM Control Desk 7.6.1.2 and 7.6.1.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199228.
